Histogram.Name: CSC/EventInfo/reportSummaryMap
Histogram.Title: Top Physics Efficiency
Histogram.Descr: This histogram displays CSC top efficiency for Physics. Eta/Phi space is divided into 100x100 cells. Each cell is active (green) if at least one HW element (in the Eta/Phi area covered by cell) is active for more than one station. Otherwise cell is not active (grey). Efficiency rate displays the fraction of active cells that can be covered by CSC. Note that standalone CSC covers from (+-) 1 to (+-) 2.45 Eta space.
